description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Greetings

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: The first message that is sent to the user. It introduces your organization and the service you provide through this bot.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Content prompt

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: This message prompts the user to submit content for a fact-check.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Add more content

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: This message is sent when user selects the option to add more content.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Submission prompt

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: This message is sent to user after they send content, to make sure all the information they want to submit has been provided.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Submission received

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: The confirmation sent to the user after the content is submitted.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: No search result

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: If the bot doesn't find any relevant fact-checks in your database, it informs users that the content has been sent to journalists.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Feedback prompt

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: After fact-checks are returned to the user, the bot automatically follows up to ask if the results are satisfactory.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Positive feedback

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: If the user is satisfied, this message's purpose is to thank them for their feedback.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Negative feedback

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: If the user is not satisfied, this message informs the user that the content has been sent to journalists.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Newsletter opt-in and opt-out

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: This message informs user about their subscription status. You must keep the placeholders as is (do not translate content within brackets).

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Option not available

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: The message sent if the user response is not a valid option.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Conversation time out

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: After 15 minutes of inactivity, this message is sent to users to close the conversation.

description: Title of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: Inactive bot

description: Description of a customizable string of the tipline bot.
defaultMessage: If the tipline is set to inactive, this message is sent in response to any user message.

description: Page title where users can customize the content that the tipline bot will respond with
defaultMessage: Bot Content & Translations

description: Error message displayed on the tipline settings page when the placeholder is not present
defaultMessage: The placeholder {subscription_status} is missing from your custom content or translation
